########################################################################
# Setup library
########################################################################
include(GrPlatform) #define LIB_SUFFIX

include_directories(${Boost_INCLUDE_DIR})
link_directories(${Boost_LIBRARY_DIRS})
list(APPEND iustsat_sources
    zafar_telemetry_rx_impl.cc
    zafar_telemetry_frame_extractor_impl.cc
    zafar_telemetry_derand_impl.cc
    synch_detect_tag_impl.cc
    synch_detect_tag2_impl.cc
    test_impl.cc
    pdu_debug_impl.cc
    pdu_debug_2_impl.cc
    tag_counter_impl.cc
    rs_to_decrypt_impl.cc
    frame_analysis_impl.cc
    pdu_to_message_impl.cc
    zafar_telemetry_deinterleave_impl.cc
    pack_rsblock_impl.cc
    )

set(iustsat_sources "${iustsat_sources}" PARENT_SCOPE)
if(NOT iustsat_sources)
	MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ sources... skipping lib/")
	return()
endif(NOT iustsat_sources)

add_library(gnuradio-iustsat SHARED ${iustsat_sources})
target_link_libraries(gnuradio-iustsat ${Boost_LIBRARIES} ${GNURADIO_ALL_LIBRARIES})
set_target_properties(gnuradio-iustsat PROPERTIES DEFINE_SYMBOL "gnuradio_iustsat_EXPORTS")

if(APPLE)
    set_target_properties(gnuradio-iustsat PROPERTIES
        INSTALL_NAME_DIR "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib"
    )
endif(APPLE)

########################################################################
# Install built library files
########################################################################
include(GrMiscUtils)
GR_LIBRARY_FOO(gnuradio-iustsat RUNTIME_COMPONENT "iustsat_runtime" DEVEL_COMPONENT "iustsat_devel")

########################################################################
# Build and register unit test
########################################################################
include(GrTest)

include_directories(${CPPUNIT_INCLUDE_DIRS})

list(APPEND test_iustsat_sources
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/test_iustsat.cc
)

add_executable(test-iustsat ${test_iustsat_sources})

target_link_libraries(
  test-iustsat
  ${GNURADIO_RUNTIME_LIBRARIES}
  ${Boost_LIBRARIES}
  ${CPPUNIT_LIBRARIES}
  gnuradio-iustsat
)

GR_ADD_TEST(test_iustsat test-iustsat)

########################################################################
# Print summary
########################################################################
message(STATUS "Using install prefix: ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}")
message(STATUS "Building for version: ${VERSION} / ${LIBVER}")
